EmailTemplate.description: Email notification sent to internal user when their pre-book has been rejected by the dealer
EmailTemplate.name: Pre Book Rejected HTML
EmailTemplate.subject: Pre-Book {!Opportunity.Name} has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName},
Pre-book {!Opportunity.Name} that you submitted for approval has been rejected by the dealer.
{!Opportunity.Link}
Thanks!
